# Government Tender Announcement
### W3027-236698 : Laundry and Dry Cleaning Services

#### Tender Details

* **Tender Title:** Laundry and Dry Cleaning Services
* **Tender Reference:** WS4296392473-Doc4296509006
* **Tender Amendment Number:** 6
* **Tender Publication Date:** January 9, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** January 31, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** May 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** April 30, 2025

#### Service Description

The Department of National Defence (DND), located in London, Ontario, requires Laundry and Dry Cleaning Services on an as-and-when requested basis. DND intends to issue a Standing Offer for a one-year period, with three additional one-year option periods. 

#### Evaluation Criteria

There are two Streams applicable to this requirement: Stream 1, Ontario Region, and Stream 2, Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business Ontario Region. These Streams will be evaluated separately. The Standing Offer will be awarded to the lowest priced offer in each Stream.

#### Contract Award Conditions

All required supporting documentation must be submitted by January 31, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST. Any bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.

#### Additional Information

This procurement is subject to the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), the Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), the Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), and the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA).

#### Contact Information

For more information, please contact Nathalie Longtin (SPAC/PSPC), [nathalie.longtin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:nathalie.longtin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).
